content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)), currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)), currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)), currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)), currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space in its inventory to accept the items being inserted. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) was full when attempting to insert coal.
- Check the inventory before attempting to insert items to ensure there are enough resources available.

### Errors when not having enough resources
- Make sure to gather sufficient iron ore before attempting to insert into the furnaces. The logs indicate that there was not enough iron ore left in inventory to insert into the furnaces.
